abstract: Nigerian officials blame Boko Haram militants for two-day spate of attacks in Maiduguri and Madagali that killed dozens and overwhelmed area hospitals with wounded; strikes with rocket-propelled grenades and bomb explosions occurred days after Pres Muhammadu Buhari said country ‘technically won the war’ against extremist organization.
lead_paragraph: At least 52 people were killed and 124 injured in bombings and shootings in the city of Maiduguri.

headline.main: Suspected Boko Haram Attacks Kill Scores in Nigeria
headline.print_headline: Boko Haram Is Blamed for Series of Deadly Attacks in Nigeria’s North

snippet: At least 52 people were killed and 124 injured in bombings and shootings in the city of Maiduguri.
